job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: <p><strong>Location: South San Francisco, CA</strong></p><p><strong>Duration: 6+ Months Contract</strong></p><p><br></p><p>You will join the department of AI/Client within Research Biology. You will collaborate with scientists working on different areas of machine learning and the life sciences.</p><p>You will closely collaborate with machine learning scientists, computational chemists and bioinformaticians across departments in the organization.</p><p>You will develop and deploy deep learning methods for representation learning of small molecules and prediction of chemical properties.</p><p>The work will also involve software development, infrastructure and hardware optimizations, data pipelining, and innovations to implement robust AI solutions for real world use cases.</p><p><br></p><p>Demonstrated experience with deep learning frameworks and models (PyTorch is preferred).</p><p>Proficient in Python.</p><p>Demonstrated experience in software development, GPU acceleration, model optimization and scaling for multiple server nodes.</p><p>Excellent communication and collaboration skills.</p><p><br></p><p><strong>-MSc or PhD degree in a quantitative field (e.g. Computer Science, Computational Chemistry, Machine Learning, Statistics, Mathematics, Physics). </strong></p><p><strong>-Industry experience as data scientist or ML engineer in a healthcare company. </strong></p><p><strong>-Experience in deep learning for graph-based and/or sequence-based data. </strong></p><p><strong>-Experience in deep learning for small molecules.</strong></p>
